title: Officina Marconi
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Organic, Mediterranean, Fast food, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Small cafe/bar on one of the main squares in Jesolo. Has fresh juices, soya milk for coffee drinks. Ask for the vegan food options like brioche, toast, and sandwich with vegan cheese. At night it turns into a bar with cocktails and snacks.
